reasoning: This describes the main task or problem addressed by the algorithm.
This specifies the domain of the text being processed.
This describes a sub-task within the main task, focusing on information retrieval.
This describes the type of text data used as input.
This refers to a challenge in processing the text data.
This is the system or algorithm designed to perform the parsing task.
This describes a key optimization technique used by the algorithm.
This refers to a component of the chart structure used in the parsing process.
This is the data structure used to represent the parsing process.
This refers to a specific set of edges that are selected as part of the parsing process.
This refers to a syntactic unit identified during parsing.
This refers to the range of words covered by a constituent.
This describes a rule-based approach for identifying phrase boundaries.
This refers to a specific type of word used in the heuristics.
This describes a general approach to using rules for parsing.
This refers to syntactic units identified during parsing.
This refers to a type of category used in the parsing process, based on meaning.
This refers to a type of category used in the parsing process, based on grammatical structure.
This refers to a measure of uncertainty in the parsing process.
